Name: Khospis
About the game: From the Indie Game Development Studio 'MushRoom Angels Games'. Set in the forest. You will embark on an adventure through hell. The biggest challenge is not going to be fear, to get away you will need to use strategy. Gameplay in First Personnel, You have the goal to escape. To escape it will be necessary to find keys, reconnect the generators and unravel puzzles, but this task will not be easy, Grandma and her animals will not let. In the Kelvin Storyline Mysteriously awakens in a strange mansion inhabited by an old lunatic, to escape Kelvin realizes that not so long ago, with each passing day the task becomes more difficult. To escape the mansion will not be easy WHO WE ARE? MushRoom Angels Games was founded by Luiz Felipe Marian in 2018 with headquarters in Brazil -Cuiab√° MT. Has its focus on the development of independent games, such as the intention to make virtual content available to the public. The Creator Luiz Felipe Marian, 18, since childhood, dreams of being an entrepreneur. he found his vocation in the programming world as well as a path to success. Currently Only Luiz F Marian works in development, performing the functions: * GAME DESIGNER *PROGRAMMER * TESTER *ANIMATOR * DESIGNER OF CHARACTER AND SCENARIO * LEVEL DESIGNER *EXECUTIVE PRODUCER
